New Records: James Harden hit go-ahead free throws with 17.9 seconds left
Key Match Events: James Harden made two more free throws with less than two seconds remaining to complete his 27-point performance
Ivica Zubac won the tip back to Harden
Post-Match Reflections: The Clippers won three straight and five of six
The Pelicans have lost 10 straight and 19 of 20
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Clippers converted 14 offensive rebounds into 20 second-chance points
The Pelicans hit a season-best 18 3s in a game
Others: The Clippers visit San Antonio on Tuesday night
The Pelicans visit Miami on Wednesday
